Class UserModel

java.lang.Object
com.sc2002.model.UserModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApplicantModel, HDBManagerModel
public abstract class UserModel extends Object
Abstract class representing a user in the system. This class provides basic user attributes and functionalities

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    age
    The age of the user.
    private boolean
    isMarried
    The marital status, note that users will parse String "Married"/"Single" as params, ensure to handle it.
    private String
    name
    The name of the user.
    private static int
    nextUserId
    Static counter for auto-incrementing IDs.
    private String
    nric
    The National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) of the user.
    private String
    password
    The hashed password of the user.
    private ProjectViewFilterModel
    projectViewFilter
    Contains user's filter options, used to filter projectView in non-volatile manner.
    private int
    userID
    The IDs of user unique to them.
    private UserRole
    usersRole
    Contains user's Role, used for authentication.

      public Boolean getMaritalStatus()
      Retrieves the marital status of the user.
      Returns:

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password)
      Sets the password of the user after hashing it.
      Parameters:
      password - The new password to set.

    • authenticate

      public void authenticate(String password) throws AuthenticationException
      Authenticates the user with the given NRIC and password.
      Parameters:
      password - The password of the user attempting to authenticate.
      nric - The NRIC of the user attempting to authenticate.
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the NRIC or password does not match the stored credentials.

    • hashPasswd

      private String hashPasswd(String plaintext)
      Hashes the given plaintext password using SHA-256 and Base64 encoding.
      Parameters:
      plaintext - The password to hash.
      Returns:
      The hashed password, or null if an error occurs.
